Design: Embossed white on forest green with uncolored border line; VERMONT embossed in plain block letters centered below numbers, with last two digits of registration year in similar font at bottom right
Slogan: SEE embossed in same letters as VERMONT, at lower left
Notes: Alternated with white plates from 1957 to 1966

Design: Embossed forest green on white with uncolored border line; VERMONT embossed in plain block letters centered below numbers, with last two digits of registration year in similar font at bottom right
Slogan: SEE embossed in same letters as VERMONT, at lower left
Notes: Alternated with forest green plates from 1957 to 1966

Design: Embossed white on green with border line; VERMONT embossed in plain block letters centered below numbers, with last two digits of registration year in similar font at bottom right
Notes: Color changed from forest green to the kelly green used today

Design: Embossed white on green with border line; VERMONT embossed in plain block letters centered below numbers; registration sticker at bottom right corner
Slogan: SEE embossed in lower left corner
